item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: He doesn't give any extra levels or range so no, he doesn't do anything with WKai, Dou or otherwise.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Just wondering, does Mr.Orange help with Dou worldkai at all? Except for the ryo bonus, doesn't seem to do much

item.title: Where Summons Apply
item.content:encoded:
After using them for a bit, I found that Summons also apply to Worldkai (I saw the +5 Genjutsu Range boost from having Amanda on my team while fighting ADAM).

Just thought that should be added to the Summon page.

item.title: New PW Summons
item.content:encoded:
Mr. Orange - +150% Ryo
(Currently Summoned)
PW summons
you get him by finishing the dog fight.
(the one you need 5000 tips and karen as ally to start)

item.title: Billy2 Summons Requirements
item.content:encoded: Yes soren that is right, i updated the tame summons pages yesterday while recode was undergoing. So they are up to date for the most part.

item.title: Billy2 Summons Requirements
item.content:encoded:
I believe the new requirement for obtaining a summon is that you must be Hanging Out with the teaching ally, not just 300 FP.

Since 10 people achieve hanging out via FP a day for each ally (as long as FP>1000), that's not so bad, but it does make MOME/Walruses/FoA more valuable â€¦

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I think summons stay for a set amount of rolls. Meaning after you hit the max range it gives u a certain amount of times it goes away (Like say u get a range of 18 from one of the summons and u do missions I believe it counts how many times you hit over your regular range so say ur base range is 15 ok? So that means if you hit any where from 16-18 it counts as a time so it takes off a bit of the summon length or w/e)
